snippet: Health insurance companies can no longer turn away people with medical problems, but the Obama administration isn't taking any chances with thousands of vulnerable patients in a special federal program....

headline.print_headline: Insurance Plan for Sickest Gets Another Extension
headline.main: Insurance Plan for Sickest Gets Another Extension

lead_paragraph: Health insurance companies can no longer turn away people with medical problems, but the Obama administration isn't taking any chances with thousands of vulnerable patients in a special federal program.
